thread.title: Heavy D gets hands-on with buxom blonde on raunchy night out with cast of new show It’s a Pole Life
thread.title_full: Heavy D gets hands-on with buxom blonde on raunchy night out with cast of new show It’s a Pole Life

author: tpearce
title: Heavy D gets hands-on with buxom blonde on raunchy night out with cast of new show It’s a Pole Life
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CELEBRITY Big Brother star Heavy D has wasted no time in getting over his split from his fiance – and spent the evening getting touchy-feely with a bunch of scantily-clad women. 
The 43-year-old Storage Hunters star dressed up in a suitably over the top yellow suit with watermelons to join the cast and crew of new reality show It’s a Pole Life for a night on the town in Epsom. Fame Flynet Heavy D took a particular shine to one busty blonde as he partied the night away Fame Flynet Randy Heavy D couldn’t keep his hands off one particular babe Fame Flynet 15 Heavy looked like he was having the time of his life with the beautiful ladies 
He wasted no time in getting hands on with one of the cast members – who willingly grinded and twerked on him as they danced, with Heavy grabbing her from behind by the hips as she bent over in front of him. 
The flamboyant unnamed blonde then showed off her boobs as she pulled apart her silver top which already had a plunging neckline. Fame Flynet The upcoming reality star certainly wasn’t shy as she pulled away her top on the raunchy night out Fame Flynet The so-called Boominator couldn’t take his eyes off one dancer Fame Flynet 15 The CBB star looked like he was living the high life as he partied with a host of beauties 
The CBB star was seen arriving and leaving with two more of the show’s stars on each arm and looked like he was the having the time of his life as he partied away with the pole dancers. 
The dancers will soon be part of a reality TV show called It’s a Pole Life – which focuses on life behind-the-scenes of work as a pole dancer. Fame Flynet One girl treated Heavy to a sexy dance routine Fame Flynet The blonde gave the camera a wink as he grinded on her from behind Latest from TV & Showbiz All you need to know about Mark Dolan as The Jump returns to TV screens mum's the word Jemma Lucy snogs Chantelle Connelly's MUM as she meets girlfriend's family on birthday night out The golden touch All you need to know about Kadeena Cox as The Jump returns to TV screens BILLY WHIZZ All you need to know about Jason Robinson as The Jump returns to TV screens WRAP UP WARM All you need to know about Josie Gibson as The Jump returns to TV screens moving on Mariah Carey packs on the PDA as she steps out with new boyfriend Bryan Tanaka at single launch party KNIGHT OF THE ROAD BIKE Who is Bradley Wiggins? The Jump star, Tour de France victor and Olympic hero RESTORATION SONG Long-forgotten Bob Marley recordings have been restored after being found left to rot in the basement Go for gold All you need to know about Jade Jones as The Jump returns to TV screens DADDY'S HEADING HOME Liam Payne shares behind the scenes snap of him in the recording studio Jump to it All you need to know about Louis Smith as The Jump returns to TV screens DANGEROUS DAREDEVILS The Jump 2017 starts TONIGHT - here is all you need to know 
Heavy – real name Colin Newell – split with his fiancé Bryony Ann Harris on Christmas Day in an epically public Twitter spat calling time on their whirlwind romance that saw them get matching tattoos and engaged on Lizzie Cundy’s radio show after only a month. 
He later accused her of using him for his fame – and quoted Craig David to mark the end of his romance with the 21-year-old as he said on Twitter: “#imwalkingaway”. Fame Flynet Heavy couldn’t believe his luck as one woman started grinding on him Fame Flynet The star joined the cast and crew for a night out in Epsom Fame Flynet 15 The cheeky pair were all over each other during the night 
She later told the The Sun Online: “He called me fame hungry but at the end of the day, he wants fame. 
“Colin loves watching himself on TV, he’d make me watch clips of Celebrity Big Brother on repeat. Fame Flynet Heavy happily posed with fans and the cast in a ludicrously bright yellow suit Fame Flynet 15 The cast and crew of the new show were out in forced for their night out 
“He didn’t shout his catchphrase ‘Boom’ when we were home together luckily, he was never Heavy D to me he was always Colin. 
“He doesn’t want to get a proper job because he thinks he’s a famous person.” Fame Flynet The girls were quick to dance the night away Fame Flynet 15 The soon-to-be reality star wasn't afraid to bare her bust on the night out 
She then added: “His big dream is going onto I’m A Celebrity – he seriously thinks it’s going to happen.” 
Bryony also added that she felt like his ‘unpaid cleaner’ as she tidied up after him and cooked her former other half meals.
